title: Rothmill A4 White Card Stock, 280gsm Weight and 370 Micron Thickness, Ideal for Arts and Craft, Office and Stationery Use - 50 Sheets
features: PREMIUM THICKNESS A4 CARD PACK – Includes 50 sheets of high-quality white A4 card with a weight of 280gsm and a thickness of 370 microns. Sturdy yet flexible, this card can be easily cut and folded, with scoring recommended for the best results.

PERFECT FOR ARTS, CRAFTS AND CUTTING MACHINES – Rothmill card is ideal for a wide range of creative projects. It’s also compatible with digital cutting machines like Cricut, making it a great choice for precision crafting and printing.

EASY TO PERSONALISE & DECORATE – With its smooth surface, this card is perfect for drawing, colouring, and painting. Suitable for use with pencils, markers, ballpoint pens, and a variety of paints. Also works well with glue for adding embellishments.

SUSTAINABLY SOURCED & ECO-FRIENDLY – Made from 100% recyclable materials, Rothmill card is responsibly produced using certified virgin fibre pulp from managed forests within the EU. Environmentally friendly without compromising on quality.

OVER A CENTURY OF PAPER-CRAFTING EXPERTISE – With over 100 years of heritage in crafting premium paper and card, Rothmill masterfully blends tradition, innovation, and quality to craft premium paper and card that stand the test of time.
description: Product Description Rothmill There are lots of coloured papers on the market, so why choose ours? First, it's good stuff - well made and sourced from managed forests, and we have more colours than you can shake a stick at. Take orange, for example, there's Bright Orange, Provençal Orange, Sunset, Terracotta and, well, Orange. Then there's sizes and weights - some really weird ones that everybody else has stopped doing, but happen to be good if you are a creator or printer that needs something a little different, or a teacher perhaps. Key Features: Rothmill Tone Packs Suitable for card making, collage etc. Suitable for cutting with scissors Flexible for folding (score first for best results) Materials sourced from within the EU Rothmill Card (Pulpboard) Suitable for cutting with scissors Flexible for folding EU sourced Pulpboard Rothmill Board Suitable for cutting with scissors Flexible for folding Ideal for digital cutting machines, Cricut etc. EU sourced Pulpboard Ideal For: FOLDING CUTTING DIGITAL CUTTING/PRINTING MACHINES Rothmill Card (Thin) Rothmill Card (Thin) Rothmill Card (Medium) Rothmill Card (Thick) Rothmill Premium Weight Paper (120gsm) Add To Basket Add To Basket Buying Options Add To Basket Buying Options Customer Reviews 4.8 out of 5 stars 21 4.6 out of 5 stars 62 4.7 out of 5 stars 267 4.6 out of 5 stars 87 4.7 out of 5 stars 57 Price £13.49 £ 13 . 49 £13.49 £ 13 . 49 — no data £10.99 £ 10 . 99 — no data GSM/Microns 170 GSM/230 Microns 175 GSM/230 Microns 220 GSM/280 Microns 280 GSM/350 Microns 120 GSM Sheet Count 100 100 50 50 100 Material Pulpboard, virgin fibre Pulpboard, virgin fibre Pulpboard, virgin fibre Pulpboard, virgin fibre Paper, virgin fibre Black & White ✓ - no data - no data - no data - no data Assorted Colours - no data ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Tone Packs - no data - no data ✓ - no data - no data Digital Print/Cut ✓ ✓ ✓ Check machine ✓ Size 210 x 297 mm (A4) 210 x 297 mm (A4) 210 x 297 mm (A4) 210 x 297 mm (A4) 210 x 297 mm (A4) Weight 1060 grams 1091 grams 686 grams ‎873 grams 748 grams
